question:
Which of the following can be the chairman of Permanent Lok Adalat?
1. A person has been a district judge
2. A person who has held the post of additional district judge
3. A person who has held judicial office higher in rank than that of the district judge
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation:
The Permanent Lok Adalat shall consist of a Chairman. The chairman can be a person who is or has been a district judge or additional district judge or has held judicial office higher in rank than that of the district judge and two other persons having adequate experience in public utility
services.
